newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish shares close mixed in continuous trade.
newsitem.headline: Polish shares close mixed in continuous trade.

text.p: Nine stocks rose, five fell and nine were flat in 6.5-million-zloty Warsaw bourse continuous trade on Monday with the WIG 20 index down 0.7 percent to 1,626.5 points.
In comparison with their main market fixing, 17 stocks fell, four rose and two were flat.
The remaining seven stocks did not trade.
The National Investment Fund NIF index fell 1.2 percent to 133.9 points in 1.3-million-zloty trade.
NFI units rose 1.2 percent to 132 zlotys in 2.6-million-zloty turnover.
